hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_REF
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch/Commit/Symref to fetch manifest file by repo utility.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_REPO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Repository to fetch manifest file by repo utiity.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO_MANIFEST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to manifest file for repo utility.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BB_PACKAGES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Package(s) to be built by BitBake.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ARTIFACTS_NFS_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to NFS /work directory where to store build artifacts.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WORKDIR_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to /scratch directory where to build OpenEmbedded.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash set -euxo pipefail
# This doesn't work in Jenkins # module load python/python/3.9.2
# Figure out details about SLURM node echo $NODE_NAME hostname date
# Information from the node cat /etc/os-release lscpu nproc free -g # df might fail on some .wake / fuse files # df -h env
# Create and switch to a proper work location (/scratch) #WORKDIR=$WORKDIR_PATH/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID #rm -rf $WORKDIR #mkdir -p $WORKDIR #chgrp -R syssw $WORKDIR #cd $WORKDIR
# Check that we have system Python which python3
# Unset any proxies that might be there #unset https_proxy #unset http_proxy
#mkdir -p $WORKSPACE_TMP
# Get repo tool #mkdir -p $WORKDIR/bin #PATH=$WORKDIR/bin:$PATH
#export GOOGLE_REPO=$(mktemp $WORKSPACE_TMP/repo.XXXXXXXXX) #curl -o ${GOOGLE_REPO} https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo #gpg --keyserver keys.openpgp.org --recv-key 8BB9AD793E8E6153AF0F9A4416530D5E920F5C65 #curl -s https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo.asc | gpg --verify - ${GOOGLE_REPO} && install -m 755 ${GOOGLE_REPO} $WORKDIR/bin/repo
#unset https_proxy #unset http_proxy
#which repo
#python3 $WORKDIR/bin/repo init -u $GIT_REPO -b $GIT_REF -m $REPO_MANIFEST #python3 $WORKDIR/bin/repo sync #python3 $WORKDIR/bin/repo start ci --all
# Get the toolchain #./openembedded-core/scripts/install-buildtools -r yocto-3.2_M2 -t 20200729 #. ./openembedded-core/buildtools/environment-setup-x86_64-pokysdk-linux source /nfs/teams/sw/static/syssw/jenkins/buildtools/yocto-3.2_M2_20200729_3.1+snapshot/environment-setup-x86_64-pokysdk-linux
# Init OE environment set +euxo pipefail source ./freedom-u-sdk/setup.sh set -euxo pipefail
sed -i "s@^.*DL_DIR ?= .*@DL_DIR ?= \"/nfs/teams/sw/static/syssw/jenkins/downloads\"@" ${WORKSPACE}/build/conf/local.conf # Start building # MACHINE=$OE_MACHINE BB_NUMBER_THREADS=$(($(nproc) / 4)) nice ionice -c3 time bitbake $BB_PACKAGES MACHINE=$OE_MACHINE nice ionice -c3 time bitbake $BB_PACKAGES
mkdir -p $ARTIFACTS_NFS_PATH/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID rsync -avzh $WORKSPACE/build/tmp-glibc/deploy $ARTIFACTS_NFS_PATH/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID/
# XXX: we need OE_MACHINE in the path and have a symlink to point to the latest build
# 23:40:37 + rm -rf /scratch/syssw/jenkins/fusdk-public-davidlt/fusdk-public-build/10 # 23:40:37 rm: cannot remove '/scratch/syssw/jenkins/fusdk-public-davidlt/fusdk-public-build/10/build/buildhistory/.git': Directory not empty # Something must be writing to the directory while we are deleting # delay deleting
sleep 60 #rm -rf $WORKDIR
set +euxo pipefail
